name: Sign of the Dawnflower
components: S, F (your holy symbol, or a depiction of either Sarenrae's holy symbol or the goddess herself)
text: As message, except the only information you can transmit is that you are a worshiper of Sarenrae. Once notified, the target can reply that he understands your sign. The spell transmits meaning, not sound, and transcends language barriers.
components_zh: 姿势、器材 (你的圣徽，或是描述莎仑莱的神圣象征或女神本人)
text_zh: 如同传讯术(message)，除了你可以传递的唯一讯息就是你是莎仑莱的信徒。一旦告知后，受术者可以回传告诉你他知道了你的印记。此法术传输的是意义，不是声音，并且能跨越语言的藩篱。
